alert.note: Alert for Pike; Polk County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 8:54AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Pike and southwestern Polk Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 854 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Wickes to near De Kalb. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wickes... Grannis... Daisy... Vandervoort... Narrows Dam... Daisy State Park... Bear Creek Public Use Area... Lodi... Langley... Hatton... Nathan... Highland in Pike County... New Hope in Pike County... Bogg Springs... Kirby... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
